vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ki.22.14;
father of: Tikvah (H8616); also called Hasrah at 2Ch.34.22;
Another name of char.chas (חַרְחַס "Harhas" H2745)
§ Hasrah = "lack"
grandfather of Shallum who was the husband of Huldah, the prophetess; also spelled 'Harhas'
vocabInfos._es_Definition: ancestro de Salum, esposo de Huldá, profetisa
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
哈斯拉 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "缺乏"
沙龍的祖父, 沙龍是女先知戶勒大的丈夫; 亦作 哈珥哈斯([2745]) #代下 34:22|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
哈斯拉 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "缺乏"
沙龙的祖父, 沙龙是女先知户勒大的丈夫; 亦作 哈珥哈斯([2745]) #代下 34:22|
